title: Front-End Developer
description: Contributed across Vue 2/3 e-commerce apps, led a Vue 2â†’3 + Nuxt migration, and helped standardize styling with Tailwind.
highlights: Worked on both Vue 2 and Vue 3 applications during tenure, contributing to the conversion of a Vue 2 e-commerce application to Vue 3 and Nuxt, as well as developing features for a single-page e-commerce admin application using Vue 3
Participated in the migration of the company's front-end codebase from Bootstrap to Tailwind CSS, which resulted in a more streamlined and flexible styling system for the Vue applications
Introduced concepts from TypeScript to the team, which were used to improve the quality of our JSDoc documentation
